descriptionNullable:
This dataset consists of images from three different datasets [1-3] and other images gathered from the Internet.
Objects (doors, windows, and stairs) were labelled with the YOLO annotation tool and added to text files (Labels: "0": "door", "1": "stairs", "2": "window")
Please cite my paper if you use it in your research:	
Alparslan, Ö., Özcan, A. & Çetin, Ö. (2022). Model ve Veri Odaklı Yaklaşımlar ile Nesne Tespit Başarısının Arttırılmasına Yönelik ESA ve Veri Seti Optimizasyonları . Mühendislik Bilimleri ve Araştırmaları Dergisi , 4 (2) , 121-128 . DOI: 10.46387/bjesr.1106501

My references:

[1]Arduengo, Miguel, Carme Torras, and Luis Sentis. "Robust and adaptive door operation with a mobile manipulator robot."arXiv preprint arXiv:1902.09051 (2019).	
[2] Kuznetsova, A., Rom, H., Alldrin, N., Uijlings, J., Krasin, I., PontTuset, J., et al. (2018). The open images dataset v4: Unified image classification, object detection, and visual relationship detection at scale.
[3] U. Patil et al., "Deep Learning Based Stair Detection and Statistical Image Filtering for Autonomous Stair Climbing," 2019 Third IEEE International Conference on Robotic Computing (IRC), 2019, pp. 159-166, doi: 10.1109/IRC.2019.00031.
title: Door, Windows and Stairs Dataset (Annotated)
description:
This dataset consists of images from three different datasets [1-3] and other images gathered from the Internet.
Objects (doors, windows, and stairs) were labelled with the YOLO annotation tool and added to text files (Labels: "0": "door", "1": "stairs", "2": "window")
Please cite my paper if you use it in your research:	
Alparslan, Ö., Özcan, A. & Çetin, Ö. (2022). Model ve Veri Odaklı Yaklaşımlar ile Nesne Tespit Başarısının Arttırılmasına Yönelik ESA ve Veri Seti Optimizasyonları . Mühendislik Bilimleri ve Araştırmaları Dergisi , 4 (2) , 121-128 . DOI: 10.46387/bjesr.1106501

My references:

[1]Arduengo, Miguel, Carme Torras, and Luis Sentis. "Robust and adaptive door operation with a mobile manipulator robot."arXiv preprint arXiv:1902.09051 (2019).	
[2] Kuznetsova, A., Rom, H., Alldrin, N., Uijlings, J., Krasin, I., PontTuset, J., et al. (2018). The open images dataset v4: Unified image classification, object detection, and visual relationship detection at scale.
[3] U. Patil et al., "Deep Learning Based Stair Detection and Statistical Image Filtering for Autonomous Stair Climbing," 2019 Third IEEE International Conference on Robotic Computing (IRC), 2019, pp. 159-166, doi: 10.1109/IRC.2019.00031.
